parameters.name: AclPolicyList
parameters.description: The whitelisted IP CIDR blocks in the VPC that can access the private gateway.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The region ID of the private gateway.

parameters.name: GatewayId
parameters.description: The private gateway ID. To obtain the private gateway ID, see the private_gateway_id parameter in the response parameters of the ListResources operation.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC). For more information about how to obtain the VPC ID, see DescribeVpcs.
